医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
前列腺癌疫苗：进展、挑战和未来方向前列腺癌疫苗，包括树突状疫苗和肽型疫苗，为改善治疗带来了希望，但在临床有效性和验证方面面临障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Prostate-cancer-vaccines-Progress-challenges-and-future-directions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Prostate-cancer-vaccines-Progress-challenges-and-future-directions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=169bd4a3-f25d-44a3-960c-adfd64be10d7 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 08:59:00 -0500 Prostate cancer vaccines: Progress, challenges, and future directions
高剂量化疗后自体干细胞移植对套细胞淋巴瘤患者无效最新研究表明，对于初次治疗后病情缓解的套细胞淋巴瘤 (MCL) 患者来说，高剂量化疗后进行自体干细胞移植 (ASCT) 没有任何益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/High-dose-chemotherapy-followed-by-autologous-stem-cell-transplant-in effective-for-病人-with-mantle-cell-lymphoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/High-dose-chemotherapy-followed-by-autologous-stem-cell-transplant-inefficient-for-病人-with-mantle-cell-lymphoma.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb0882fb-551d-47b2-827c-68e7756fb498 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 08:17:54 -0500 High-dose chemotherapy followed by autologous stem cell transplant ineffective for patients with mantle cell lymphoma
新研究探索遗传性血色病隐藏的健康风险一项研究将血色素沉着病患者中未被发现的糖尿病与死亡率增加联系起来，强调了早期检测和修订临床指南的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/New-research-explores-hidden-health-risks-of-hereditary-hemochromatosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/New-research-explores-hidden-health-risks-of-hereditary-hemochromatosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bae64db8-f076-415d-b838-5e0e9b06a1d6 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 08:13:00 -0500 New research explores hidden health risks of hereditary hemochromatosis
研究表明金属接触与儿童超重和肥胖有关格拉纳达生物卫生研究所 (ibs.GRANADA) 和格拉纳达大学的研究人员揭示了接触不同金属的组合与儿童超重和肥胖之间的正相关和负相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Study-links-metal-exposure-to-overweight-and-obesity-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Study-links-metal-exposure-to-overweight-and-obesity-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=250170e3-198f-472b-80a9-304163459027 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 07:50:08 -0500 Study links metal exposure to overweight and obesity in children
新工具可帮助外科医生精确计划心脏瓣膜置换术伦敦玛丽女王大学和 Barts Health 的科学家开发了一种创新工具，可以模拟主动脉中的血流，帮助心脏外科医生更精确地计划手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/New-tool-helps-surgeons-plan-heart-valve-replacements-with- precision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/New-tool-helps-surgeons-plan-heart-valve-replacements-with- precision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e8b9f6f-40e8-46f9-8fd7-ce2b03cea430 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 07:41:13 -0500 New tool helps surgeons plan heart valve replacements with precision
研究凸显拉丁美洲不同医疗服务机构中风费用的差异这项研究评估了拉丁美洲的急性缺血性中风费用，揭示了影响医疗保健可及性的治疗变化和经济挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Study-highlights-disparities-in-中风-costs-across-healthcare-services-in-Latin-America.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Study-highlights-disparities-in-中风-成本-across-healthcare-services-in-Latin-America.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=567fa91c-3617-4355-afcc-865553a651dd Wed, 11 Dec 2024 07:41:00 -0500 Study highlights disparities in stroke costs across healthcare services in Latin America
父母过早接触吸烟会增加多发性硬化症的风险《神经病学、神经外科与精神病学杂志》在线发表的一项研究发现，减少童年时期父母吸烟的机会可能会降低那些有遗传倾向的人患 MS（多发性硬化症）的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Early-exposure-to-parental-smoking-linked-to-higher-MS-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Early-exposure-to-parental-smoking-linked-to-higher-MS-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13204c31-1b1c-4a22-8df4-8a1f70c0b541 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 07:35:15 -0500 Early exposure to parental smoking linked to higher MS risk
优质早餐可降低心血管疾病风险吃一顿优质早餐可以为一天提供适量的能量（约占每日摄入量的四分之一），可以降低患心血管疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Quality-breakfast-reduces-the-risk-of-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Quality-breakfast-reduces-the-risk-of-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=286ff8fb-6ccf-4cf9-a508-3bceb5d52f3d Wed, 11 Dec 2024 07:24:18 -0500 Quality breakfast reduces the risk of cardiovascular disease
研究揭示肠道微生物组在血糖敏感性中的个体特异性作用研究揭示了个体肠道微生物群对高碳水化合物饮食的反应如何影响血糖敏感性，为个性化营养铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Study-reveals-gut-microbiomee28099s-person-specific-role-in-glycemic-sensitivity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Study-reveals-gut-microbiomee28099s-person-specific-role-in-glycemic-sensitivity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f99712d0-e3a3-47a6-8c23-b0542abc7250 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 07:17:00 -0500 Study reveals gut microbiome’s person-specific role in glycemic sensitivity
Bedfont® Scientific Limited 荣获肯特商业奖双赢Bedfont® 荣获 2024 年度最佳中型企业和肯特最佳企业称号，展示了其在呼吸分析技术和可持续商业实践方面的领先地位。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Secures-a-Double-Win-at-the-Kent-Business-Awards.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Secures-a-Double-Win-at-the-Kent-Business-Awards.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13650249-8428-4993-a1a9-cd73cd37ff95 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 07:06:00 -0500 Bedfont® Scientific Limited Secures a Double Win at the Kent Business Awards
